verbs.description: hate begets [V: hate] love begets love hate begets hate love begets love do we make it our life ambition to prove others wrong and ourselves right to humiliate those who oppose us or if possible as far as it depends on us live peaceably with all and seek to win them over with friendship and understanding do we stockpile hate or love love martin luther king jesus matthew african american king rome martin luther king jr
